turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my current balance and recent transactions. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Please verify your identity by entering your account number and password.  Once you've done that, I can provide you with the details you requested.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, done.  Wait, I see a charge here that I don't recognize. It says 'Online Purchase - Amazon'.  What's the best way to dispute this?  And also, why wasn't I notified about this charge beforehand? This is frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the unauthorized charge and the lack of notification. To dispute the transaction, you'll need to fill out a dispute form, which I can provide. Regarding the notification, our system should have sent a push notification. Let me check the log to determine the cause. In the meantime, can you provide the last four digits of the card used for this purchase? This will help me to further investigate.
